data.eml:eml: Review of the genus Ceratotarsonemus De Leon, 1956 (Acari: Prostigmata: Tarsonemidae), with description of a new species from the Amazon Forest

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rezende, José Marcos, Lofego, Antonio Carlos, Gulbronson, Connor, Bauchan, Gary, Ochoa, Ronald (2018): Review of the genus Ceratotarsonemus De Leon, 1956 (Acari: Prostigmata: Tarsonemidae), with description of a new species from the Amazon Forest. Zootaxa 4483 (2): 271-294, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4483.2.3
